name: Piggy-Back Dice
description:
A fully immersive dice-balancing sim which is both the "Dark Souls" and the "Pajama Sam" of dice sims.

Position your character atop the correct dice face without falling off to earn points. 

See how many points you can get before time runs out!

Move Character Left/Right - - - - - - - - - - -  - - - - - -  - - - - -  A / D

Move Character Forward/Backward - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - W / S

Rotate Terrain - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -  ARROW KEYS / MOUSE

Jump - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - SPACE

Run - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -  LEFT SHIFT

Pause - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ESC / P

Reset Score - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -  ENTER
